import React from 'react' import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Sidebar from '../../Sidebar/Sidebar' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import { Input } from '../../common/FormsControls/Input' import Button3 from '../../SiteButtons/Button3/Button3' import UploadFile from '../../common/UploadFile/UploadFile' import SuccessMessage from '../../common/ServerMessages/SuccessMessage' import ErrorMessage from '../../common/ServerMessages/ErrorMessage' const InformPage = (props) => { const updateInform = (formData) => { var data=new FormData(); if(formData.userImage!=null){ debugger data.append("file",formData.userImage[0]) } else{ debugger data.append("file",props.inform.userImage) } data.append("city",formData.city) data.append("code",formData.code) data.append("name",formData.name) data.append("phone",formData.phone) data.append("post",formData.post) data.append("surname",formData.surname) data.append("country",formData.country) props.updateInform(data) } const setInform=(formData)=>{ var data=new FormData(); if(formData.userImage){ data.append("file",formData.userImage[0]) } else{ data.append("file",props.inform.userImage) } data.append("city",formData.city) data.append("code",formData.code) data.append("name",formData.name) data.append("phone",formData.phone) data.append("post",formData.post) data.append("surname",formData.surname) data.append("country",formData.country) props.setInform(data) } return (
{props.success&&props.success.message != null ? :props.inform?:}
) } const UserInformForm = (props) => { return (
{props.initialValues&&props.initialValues.userImage?:

Here will be your photo

}
{props.errors&&props.errors.id === 'USER_INFORM_CHANGE_ERROR' ? :null} ) } export const ReduxUserInform = reduxForm({ form: 'userInform' })(UserInformForm) export default InformPage
